divs: sighting detailsi woke up at 4am and i saw some sort of light out the corner of my eye from the direction of the sliding glass door in my bedroom. i then looked out the glass door to see a very large round\circular like object, glowing green\blue above the tree line toward the ocean. it darted up\down and side to side. very fast! very erratic! then it just shot out of sight in a second. we live in paradise park and our bedrrom windows and doors face towards the ocean. we live in the middle of the subdivision between paradise dr. and makuu dr.. this is the first time i have seen this sort of thing.
Summary: Saw a Large Circular Glowing Green/Blue Object
